title: I still want Item Sets in New Client
body:
I understand that a smaller percentage of players actually use the Item Sets... but I was one of those players that invested the time in building an item set for EVERY champ I played... especially my mains.. I labeled and organised so I was able to build according to what was going on in the game. Now my builds have grown stale... and recommended is not always the most optimal build for certain champions... and I spend more time looking for stuff than getting back to lane. Please plan on adding this back to the new client if you ever disable the legacy client... as I switched back and don't plan on going to the new client unless it has item sets...

Thank you

Seconded.
From what I read in previous client posts & blogs, they will have them either later in beta, or shortly after beta. For now, you can still update the sets in the legacy client.

I agree with you. Many don't use Item Sets but they're a vital tool for players who like to plan out their builds. 

I was disappointed that I was not able to create Item Sets in the new client.
